Pseudo bullseye plot

Source: R/pseudobullseye.R
pseudobullseye.Rd

Pseudo bullseye plot

pseudobullseye(
  x,
  lim = range(x, na.rm = TRUE),
  legend = FALSE,
  text = TRUE,
  reverse = FALSE,
  center = TRUE,
  cex = 1,
  legend.width = 1
)

Arguments

x

3D array

lim

limits of x values

legend

boolean, add legend?

text

boolean, should text legend be added?

reverse

boolean, reverse colors?

center

boolean, should input x be centered before plotting

cex

cex for text legend

legend.width

Width in characters of the legend strip.

Value

plots

Examples

data(cmrsim)
pseudobullseye(maxresp_sim)
